TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator

summary.span: 支持对非泛型集合的简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是所有非泛型枚举器的基接口。 is the base interface for all non-generic enumerators. 它的泛型等效项是 接口。Its generic equivalent is the interface. C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用， `foreach` 而不是直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 此 方法提供用于 COM 互操作性，无需完全实现; 相反，实施者可以引发 。The method is provided for COM interoperability and does not need to be fully implemented; instead, the implementer can throw a . 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在读取的值之前，必须调用 方法，以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素 ; 否则， 则为 undefined。You must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of ; otherwise, is undefined. 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要 再次将设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 （如果它已实现），后跟 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call , if it's implemented, followed by . 如果 未实现，则必须创建新的枚举器实例以返回到集合的第一个元素。If is not implemented, you must create a new enumerator instance to return to the first element of the collection. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器的行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 自定义集合的和接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the and interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，不会显式调用这些接口的成员，而是实现它们以支持使用 `foreach` `for each` Visual Basic) 中的 (来循环访问集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下任何条件下均未定义： is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 枚举器位于集合中第一个元素之前，紧跟在创建枚举器之后。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 在读取的值之前，必须调用以将枚举数前移到集合的第一个元素 。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 对返回的最后一个调用 `false` ，指示集合的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 由于对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），枚举器无效。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中， 不会显式调用，而是实现它以支持 `foreach` `for each` 在 Visual Basic) 中使用 (。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大的 接口示例。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 ；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建枚举器之后或在 调用方法之后，枚举数将定位在集合的第一个元素之前，对方法的第一次调用 将枚举器移动到集合的第一个元素上。After an enumerator is created or after the method is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to the method moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回， `false` 直到 调用。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false` until is called. 如果对集合进行了更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则的行为 是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中， 不会显式调用，而是实现它以支持 `foreach` `for each` 在 Visual Basic) 中使用 (。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大的 接口示例。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. exception.span: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

summary.span: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对集合进行了更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则的行为 是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of is undefined. 提供此方法是为了实现 COM 互操作性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要实现;相反，实施者可以直接引发 。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中， 不会显式调用，而是实现它以支持 `foreach` `for each` 在 Visual Basic) 中使用 (。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大的 接口示例。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. para.span: 对的所有调用都 必须为枚举器生成相同的状态。

span.span: All calls to must result in the same state for the enumerator.

para.span: 首选的实现是在第一个元素之前将枚举器移动到集合的开头。

span.span: The preferred implementation is to move the enumerator to the beginning of the collection, before the first element.

para.span: 如果在创建枚举器后对集合进行了修改，则此操作将使枚举器失效，这与 和一致 。

span.span: This invalidates the enumerator if the collection has been modified since the enumerator was created, which is consistent with and .

exception.span: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
